  juce_audio_basics
  PATH "${JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH}"
)

  juce_audio_devices
  PATH "${JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH}"
  # JUCE_USE_WINRT_MIDI
  # JUCE_ASIO
  # JUCE_WASAPI
  # JUCE_WASAPI_EXCLUSIVE
  # JUCE_DIRECTSOUND
  # JUCE_ALSA
  # JUCE_JACK
  # JUCE_BELA
  # JUCE_USE_ANDROID_OBOE
  # JUCE_USE_OBOE_STABILIZED_CALLBACK
  # JUCE_USE_ANDROID_OPENSLES
  # JUCE_DISABLE_AUDIO_MIXING_WITH_OTHER_APPS
)

  juce_audio_formats
  PATH "${JUCE_MODULES_GLOBAL_PATH}"
  # JUCE_USE_FLAC
  # JUCE_USE_OGGVORBIS
  # JUCE_USE_MP3AUDIOFORMAT
  # JUCE_USE_LAME_AUDIO_FORMAT
  # JUCE_USE_WINDOWS_MEDIA_FORMAT
)

  # JUCE_SYNC_VIDEO_VOLUME_WITH_OS_MEDIA_VOLUME

jucer_export_target(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  VST_LEGACY_SDK_FOLDER "~/SDKs/VST_SDK/VST2_SDK"
  # VST3_SDK_FOLDER
  EXTRA_PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
    "BESPOKE_MAC"
  EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS
    "-iwithsysroot"
    "/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/include/python2.7"
  EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
    "-L/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/lib/python2.7/config"
    "-lpython2.7"
    "-ldl"
    "-framework"
    "CoreFoundation"
  MICROPHONE_ACCESS ON
  EXTRA_SYSTEM_FRAMEWORKS
    "Python"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "Bespoke"
  HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
    "Source\\json\\include"
    "Source\\push2"
    "Source\\push2\\libusb"
    "Source\\push2\\modules\\libusb"
  OPTIMISATION "-O0 (no optimisation)"
  ENABLE_PLUGIN_COPY_STEP ON
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Xcode (MacOSX)"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "Bespoke"
  HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
    "Source\\json\\include"
    "Source\\push2"
    "Source\\push2\\libusb"
    "Source\\push2\\modules\\libusb"
  OPTIMISATION "-O3 (fastest with safe optimisations)"
  ENABLE_PLUGIN_COPY_STEP ON
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Visual Studio 2019"
  #VST_LEGACY_SDK_FOLDER "C:\\SDKs\\VST_SDK\\VST2_SDK\\public.sdk\\source\\vst2.x"
  VST3_SDK_FOLDER "C:\\SDKs\\VST_SDK\\VST3_SDK"
  EXTRA_PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
    "GLEW_STATIC"
    "BESPOKE_WINDOWS"
    "POLL_WINDOWS"
    "THREADS_WINDOWS"
    "HAVE_STRUCT_TIMESPEC"
  EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS
    "/bigobj"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2019"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  BINARY_NAME "BespokeSynth"
  HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
    "Source\\json\\include"
    "Source\\glew\\include"
    "Source\\push2"
    "Source\\push2\\libusb"
    "Source\\push2\\modules\\libusb"
    "C:\\Python39\\include"
  EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
    "C:\\Python39\\libs"
  OPTIMISATION "No optimisation"
  ENABLE_PLUGIN_COPY_STEP OFF
  WARNING_LEVEL "Low"
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
  DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT "Program Database (/Zi)"
  RELAX_IEEE_COMPLIANCE OFF
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Visual Studio 2019"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  BINARY_NAME "BespokeSynth"
  HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
    "Source\\json\\include"
    "Source\\glew\\include"
    "Source\\push2"
    "Source\\push2\\libusb"
    "Source\\push2\\modules\\libusb"
    "C:\\Python39\\include"
  EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
    "C:\\Python39\\libs"
  LINK_TIME_OPTIMISATION ON
  OPTIMISATION "Maximise speed"
  ENABLE_PLUGIN_COPY_STEP OFF
  WARNING_LEVEL "Low"
  GENERATE_MANIFEST ON
  # ARCHITECTURE "x64"
  DEBUG_INFORMATION_FORMAT "Program Database (/Zi)"
)

jucer_export_target(
  "Linux Makefile"
  # VST_LEGACY_SDK_FOLDER
  EXTRA_PREPROCESSOR_DEFINITIONS
    "GLEW_STATIC"
    "GL_GLEXT_PROTOTYPES"
    "BESPOKE_LINUX"
  EXTRA_COMPILER_FLAGS
    "`python-config"
    "--cflags`"
  EXTRA_LINKER_FLAGS
    "`python-config"
    "--ldflags`"
  EXTERNAL_LIBRARIES_TO_LINK
    "usb-1.0"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Debug"
  DEBUG_MODE ON
  HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
    "Source\\json\\include"
    "Source\\glew\\include"
    "Source\\push2"
    "Source\\push2\\libusb"
    "Source\\push2\\modules\\libusb"
  EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
    "/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/"
)

jucer_export_target_configuration(
  "Linux Makefile"
  NAME "Release"
  DEBUG_MODE OFF
  HEADER_SEARCH_PATHS
    "Source\\json\\include"
    "Source\\glew\\include"
    "Source\\push2"
    "Source\\push2\\libusb"
    "Source\\push2\\modules\\libusb"
  EXTRA_LIBRARY_SEARCH_PATHS
    "/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/"
)

jucer_project_end()
